    • selectStudentOnCard

      public boolean selectStudentOnCard(List<Integer> positions)
      Deselects all students on the card and selects the ones in the parameter
      Parameters:
      positions - the students to select, which will replace the previously selected students
      Returns:
      true if the selection happened successfully. If even just one selection fails, this method returns false
